subject: Re: FW: Flock demo
body:

Caroline Fraher

On Thu, Jan 23, 2025 at 1:57?PM CASSON Margot X <MCasson@eugene-or.gov MCasson@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Thanks Caroline! David says he received the documents. I really appreciate your speedy assistance! 

	Thanks again,

	Margot, City of Eugene

	 

	From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com > 
	Sent: Thursday, January 23, 2025 12:28 PM
	To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
	Cc: CASSON Margot X <MCasson@eugene-or.gov MCasson@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Re: FW: Flock demo

	 

	You don't often get email from caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com . Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  

	

	[EXTERNAL ?]

	Thank you for the intro, Capt. Nice to meet you Margot.

	 

	Let me check on the NDA asap

	
 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/a545251a-9e40-4c8f-b7f9--com 

Caroline Fraher
Territory Sales Manager

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/a545251a-9e40-4c8f-b7f9-c8782ce7d72c/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGMYLDMVRG633LFZRW63JPMZWG6Y3LONQWMZLUPE======/MZRWCNBYGE4DSYZXGY3TIMBUG43GMZJZGJSWMYLDMFRTMZBSME2TGNBSGRRTGNRZ/www-facebook-com-flocksafety

	On Thu, Jan 23, 2025 at 12:26?PM BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

		Caroline, 

		 

		I have copied Margo Casson to this email and introducing you both virtually.  Margot is the point of contact for this project on behalf of our City of Eugene IT.  

		 

		Also, please see the comments below regarding the signed NDA and whether Flock received it.  Can you advise? 

		 

		Thank you   

		 

		 

		 

		 

		Jake Burke

		https://www.google.com/maps/search/300+Country+Club+Road+%0D%0A+%0D%0A+Eugene,+Oregon+97401?entry=gmail&source=g Captain � https://www.google.com/maps/search/300+Country+Club+Road+%0D%0A+%0D%0A+Eugene,+Oregon+97401?entry=gmail&source=g Investigations Division

		Eugene Police Department

		300 Country Club Road https://www.google.com/maps/search/300+Country+Club+Road+%0D%0A+%0D%0A+Eugene,+Oregon+97401?entry=gmail&source=g 

		Eugene, Oregon 97401 https://www.google.com/maps/search/300+Country+Club+Road+%0D%0A+%0D%0A+Eugene,+Oregon+97401?entry=gmail&source=g 

		(541) 682-5895 work

		 



		From: CASSON Margot X <MCasson@eugene-or.gov MCasson@eugene-or.gov > 
		Sent: Thursday, January 23, 2025 11:23 AM
		To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >; CANNATA Prudence A <PCannata@eugene-or.gov PCannata@eugene-or.gov >
		Subject: RE: Flock demo

		 

		Hello again. I checked with David Mackenzie who is handling the security portion of the software review. He digitally signed the NDA last week, but he hasn�t received access to the security documents yet. 

		The review is pending his receipt of those. 

		Jake � could you ask your contact to check on receipt of the NDA?

		Thanks,

		Margot, ISD

		 

		 

		From: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > 
		Sent: Thursday, January 16, 2025 7:20 PM
		To: CASSON Margot X <MCasson@eugene-or.gov MCasson@eugene-or.gov >; CANNATA Prudence A <PCannata@eugene-or.gov PCannata@eugene-or.gov >
		Subject: Re: Flock demo

		 

		Margot, 

		 

		I got this response this evening from Flock. 

		 

		See below for tech question clarification: 

		 

		1.	On the attached spreadsheet question #7 says: Security documents require a signed NDA so hard copy is not able to be provided. The link provided will unlock the PDF's with a page to digitally sign NDA. We were unable to find the link. Can someone please provide it? 
			https://console.whistic.com/v2/request-profile/3c67417e-cc0b-4ec4-a2db-45d3f2066ad1/77280c5d-1d09-4cfc-8788-bff5c86e9ba8 https://console.whistic.com/v2/request-profile/3c67417e-cc0b-4ec4-a2db-45d3f2066ad1/77280c5d-1d09-4cfc-8788-bff5c86e9ba8 

		2.     

			*	Do they have additional information about their update schedule or release timeline?
				Flock Safety pushes out updates on an as-needed basis with no set timeline. 

		
		Let me know if you have any other questions and I will connect you with the Flock IT person.  

		 

		Thank you 

		 

		Get Outlook for iOS https://aka.ms/o0ukef 

________________________________

		From: CASSON Margot X <MCasson@eugene-or.gov MCasson@eugene-or.gov >
		Sent: Thursday, January 16, 2025 2:49:33 PM
		To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >; CANNATA Prudence A <PCannata@eugene-or.gov PCannata@eugene-or.gov >
		Subject: RE: Flock demo 

		 

		Hi Jake. Sorry I couldn�t attend the demo this afternoon. Can you ask Flock to answer the two remaining questions ISD has for the software review? 

		Or, if you�d prefer I reach out to them can you send me their contact info? 

		Thanks so much,

		Margot, ISD

		 

		From: CASSON Margot X 
		Sent: Monday, January 13, 2025 2:05 PM
		To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >; CANNATA Prudence A <PCannata@eugene-or.gov PCannata@eugene-or.gov >
		Subject: RE: Flock demo

		 

		Hi Jake. ISD is making progress on the software review of Flock Safety. However, our security team has two questions. 

		1.	On the attached spreadsheet question #7 says: Security documents require a signed NDA so hard copy is not able to be provided. The link provided will unlock the PDF's with a page to digitally sign NDA. We were unable to find the link. Can someone please provide it?
		2.	Do they have additional information about their update schedule or release timeline?

		If you�d rather I reach out to vendor contact Caroline Fraher I�d be happy to do so, but I figured you already have a working relationship with her or someone else from Flock. 

		Thank you,

		 

		Margot Casson

		Software Asset Coordinator

		City of Eugene Information Services Department

		mcasson@eugene-or.gov mcasson@eugene-or.gov 

		Office: 541-682-5676

		 

		

		Messages to and from this e-mail address may be subject to disclosure under Oregon Public Records Law

		 

		From: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > 
		Sent: Tuesday, January 7, 2025 5:49 PM
		To: CASSON Margot X <MCasson@eugene-or.gov MCasson@eugene-or.gov >; CANNATA Prudence A <PCannata@eugene-or.gov PCannata@eugene-or.gov >
		Subject: Re: Flock demo

		 

		Excellent, thank you so much. 

		 

		Get Outlook for iOS https://aka.ms/o0ukef 

________________________________

		From: CASSON Margot X <MCasson@eugene-or.gov MCasson@eugene-or.gov >
		Sent: Tuesday, January 7, 2025 3:47:47 PM
		To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >; CANNATA Prudence A <PCannata@eugene-or.gov PCannata@eugene-or.gov >
		Subject: RE: Flock demo 

		 

		Thanks for the update. Our network team approved their portion of the software review that Travis submitted, and the final step for approval is the information security review. I don�t anticipate any hiccups with it since Flock�s data is stored in the United States and single sign-on is available. 

		I�ve asked the information security team to let me know if they have any questions for Flock prior to your demo with them. I�ll keep you posted. 

		Thanks,

		Margot, ISD

		 

		From: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > 
		Sent: Tuesday, January 7, 2025 3:06 PM
		To: CANNATA Prudence A <PCannata@eugene-or.gov PCannata@eugene-or.gov >
		Cc: CASSON Margot X <MCasson@eugene-or.gov MCasson@eugene-or.gov >
		Subject: Flock demo

		 

		Good afternoon, 

		 

		I had a phone conversation with Flock yesterday.  They will be doing their demo on January 16th from 1pm-4pm at the Eugene Police Department in the Kilcullen room.  There will also be a virtual option to view the demo that I can send out later.  The demo will last approximately 45 minutes to an hour with time set aside for Q/A.  Please let me know if you have any questions. 

		 

		Thank you  

		 

		 

		https://www.google.com/maps/search/300+Country+Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+Oregon+97401?entry=gmail&source=g 

		Jake Burke

		Captain � Investigations Division

		Eugene Police Department

		300 Country Club Road https://www.google.com/maps/search/300+Country+Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+Oregon+97401?entry=gmail&source=g 

		Eugene, Oregon 97401 https://www.google.com/maps/search/300+Country+Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+Oregon+97401?entry=gmail&source=g 

		(541) 682-5895 work

Hi Jake. ISD is making progress on the software review of Flock Safety. However, our security team has two questions. 

		1.	On the attached spreadsheet question #7 says: Security documents require a signed NDA so hard copy is not able to be provided. The link provided will unlock the PDF's with a page to digitally sign NDA. We were unable to find the link. Can someone please provide it?

		Thank you,

		 

		Margot Casson

		Software Asset Coordinator

		mcasson@eugene-or.gov mcasson@eugene-or.gov

thread_messages.subject: Flock demo
thread_messages.body:
Good afternoon, 

		 

		I had a phone conversation with Flock yesterday.  They will be doing their demo on January 16th from 1pm-4pm at the Eugene Police Department in the Kilcullen room.  There will also be a virtual option to view the demo that I can send out later.  The demo will last approximately 45 minutes to an hour with time set aside for Q/A.  Please let me know if you have any questions. 

		 

		Thank you  

		 

		 

		https://www.google.com/maps/search/300+Country+Club+Road+%0D%0A+Eugene,+Oregon+97401?entry=gmail&source=g 

		Jake Burke

		Captain � Investigations Division

		Eugene Police Department
